page.title: 03STH WINGFIELD _ LOCAL EVENTS
page.content: In our survey area there are several annual events which attract a good turn_out of local people. The{South {Wingfield Carnival}held in July on the village school's field has such attractions as bands, a Punch and Judy show, displays and stalls. In September the{Horticultural Show takes place at which the local gardeners display their fruit, flowers and vegetables. In October the parish church has a {Harvest Festival}which is always well attended. The church is decorated with fruits of the land. A large{'Bonfire' Party}is held on 5th November at Wingfield Hall. Potatoes are baked in the fire and a firework display takes place.
